name: "Solo Freight"
description:
Set in a futuristic, desolate environment, you are tasked with the mission to collect all the cargo and return it to the safe area near your outpost base, before the sandstorm moves in and engulfs your ship!

(Requires Game pad)

Controls-

Right Trigger- Accelerator

Left Trigger- Brake

Left Joystick-  Movement

Right Joystick- Camera

Right Bumper- Yaw Right

Left Bumper- Yaw Left 

B- Pick up/ Drop cargo

X- Camera reset
